attributes.additional_details: MP's use a Parliamentary Contributory Pension Fund (PCPF). This is not inline with state pensions and we would like this changed asap. This will also increase trust within parliament and enforce the notion that we are all in this together.
attributes.background: MP's have raised state pensions to 75. The people of the United Kingdom want these changes cascaded to Parliamentary Contributory Pension Fund (PCPF).

rejection.details: The state pension age has not been increased to 75 and there are no plans for it to do so. The state pension age is rising gradually. By October 2020, it will rise to 66. It will rise from 66 to 67 between the years 2026 and 2028, and then from 67 to 68 between 2044 and 2046.
